name: MazeEscape Complete Version
description:
The complete version of MazeEscape

First person Maze escape game

Two types of Maze : Random generated maze, and prefab maze

New UI ! New win condition! With background music!

Group Members:

Kevin Chao, Programmer (Random Generate Maze)

Ryan Bascos, Programmer ( UI Count Down)

Ryan Huang, Programmer (Character)

Nick, Producer (Prefab Maze & Background Music)

XiaoFan Lu, Teamlead & Programmer (Menu & Win condition)
